John:
> Sorry to ask, but is there a JSON + links generic media type somewhere?

I think of it more as a convention or design guideline than a generic media
type.
http://blog.kevburnsjr.com/standard-link-formats-in-hypermedia-representations

XML is to HTML as JSON is to _______
(the generic hypermedia type you're describing)

Maybe HMON is a good name?
(Hypermedia Object Notation)

- Kev

--00163631000d299c57049632a792
